title: 看懂NVIDIA GTC大会：从GPU到AI工厂，黄仁勋如何重塑美国科技主导地位
description: 这场被称为“人工智能超级碗”的赛事不再仅仅涉及技术规格。
titleZh: 看懂NVIDIA GTC大会：从GPU到AI工厂，黄仁勋如何重塑美国科技主导地位
titleEn: Understanding NVIDIA's GTC Conference: From GPUs to AI Factories, How Jensen Huang is Reshaping U.S. Technological Dominance
descriptionZh: 这场被称为“人工智能超级碗”的赛事不再仅仅涉及技术规格。
descriptionEn: Dubbed the "AI Super Bowl," this event is no longer just about technical specifications. Instead, Jensen Huang, standing in the heart of the U.S. capital, outlined a grand vision for an "AI Century" for America: from reshoring chip manufacturing to dominating future communication standards with AI. NVIDIA, through its "extreme co-design" approach, is striving to help the U.S. maintain its leadership in AI infrastructure and innovation.

title: QuestMobile 2025年Q3人工智能应用行业报告：移动AI应用用户突破7亿，模式升级加速，MCP推动行业开放
description: 第三季度，移动原生应用、应用内人工智能和智能手机制造商人工智能助手的用户规模分别达到2.87亿、7.06亿和5.35亿，季度复合增长率分别为3.4%、9.3%和1.2%。
titleZh: QuestMobile 2025年Q3人工智能应用行业报告：移动AI应用用户突破7亿，模式升级加速，MCP推动行业开放
titleEn: QuestMobile Q3 2025 AI Application Industry Report: Mobile AI Applications Surpass 700 Million Users, Model Upgrades Accelerate, MCP Drives Industry Openness
descriptionZh: 第三季度，移动原生应用、应用内人工智能和智能手机制造商人工智能助手的用户规模分别达到2.87亿、7.06亿和5.35亿，季度复合增长率分别为3.4%、9.3%和1.2%。
descriptionEn: The user bases for mobile-native apps, In-APP AI, and smartphone manufacturers' AI assistants reached 287 million, 706 million, and 535 million respectively in Q3, with quarterly compound growth rates of 3.4%, 9.3%, and 1.2% respectively.

title: Anthropic顶级研究员：AI进入指数级增长，你需要了解这三件事
description: 顶尖人工智能研究员 Julian Schrittwieser 强调，人工智能进步的核心衡量标准不再是“正确回答了多少个问题”，而是模型能够持续完成任务的持续时间（任务长度），目前这种能力每三到四个月就呈指数倍增长。
titleZh: Anthropic顶级研究员：AI进入指数级增长，你需要了解这三件事
titleEn: Anthropic's Top Researcher: AI Enters Exponential Growth, You Need to Understand These Three Things
descriptionZh: 顶尖人工智能研究员 Julian Schrittwieser 强调，人工智能进步的核心衡量标准不再是“正确回答了多少个问题”，而是模型能够持续完成任务的持续时间（任务长度），目前这种能力每三到四个月就呈指数倍增长。
descriptionEn: Top AI researcher Julian Schrittwieser emphasizes that the core metric of AI progress is no longer "how many questions are answered correctly," but rather the duration for which models can continuously complete tasks (task length), a capability currently doubling exponentially every three to four months.
